verses.verse: Now these are<WH5315> the names of<WH3318> the sons<WH3290> of<WH3409> Israel,<WH7657> who came<WH5315> into Egypt<WH3130> (every man and<WH4714> his household<WH1004> came<WH935> with Jacob<WH3290>):
Reuben,<WH7205> Simeon,<WH8095> Levi,<WH3878> and Judah,<WH3063>
Issachar,<WH3485> Zebulun,<WH2074> and Benjamin,<WH1144>
Dan<WH1835> and Naphtali,<WH5321> Gad<WH1410> and Asher.<WH836>
All the souls<WH5315> who came out<WH3318> of Jacob<WH3290>'s body<WH3409> were seventy<WH7657> souls,<WH5315> and Joseph<WH3130> was in Egypt already.<WH4714>
Joseph<WH3130> died,<WH4191> as did all his brothers,<WH251> and all that generation.<WH1755>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were fruitful,<WH6509> and increased abundantly,<WH8317> and multiplied,<WH7235> and grew exceedingly<WH3966> mighty;<WH6105> and the land<WH776> was filled with them.<WH4390>
Now there arose<WH6965> a new<WH2319> king<WH4428> over Egypt,<WH4714> who didn't<WH3045> know Joseph.<WH3130>
He said<WH559> to his people,<WH5971> "Behold,<WH5971> the people of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> are more<WH7227> and mightier than we.<WH6099>

Come,<WH3051> let us deal wisely<WH2449> with them,<WH7235> lest they multiply, and it happen that when any war<WH4421> breaks out,<WH7122> they<WH1931> also join<WH3254> themselves to our enemies,<WH8130> and fight<WH3898> against us,<WH5927> and escape out of the land.<WH776>"

Therefore they set<WH7760> taskmasters<WH4522> over them to afflict<WH6031> them with their burdens.<WH5450> They built<WH1129> storage<WH4543> cities<WH5892> for Pharaoh:<WH6547> Pithom<WH6619> and Raamses.<WH7486>

But the more they afflicted<WH6031> them,<WH3651> the more they multiplied<WH7235> and the more they spread out.<WH6555> They were grieved<WH6973> because<WH6440> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
The Egyptians<WH4714> ruthlessly<WH6531> made<WH5647> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> serve,<WH5647>

and they made<WH4843> their lives<WH2416> bitter<WH4843> with hard<WH7186> service,<WH5656> in mortar<WH2563> and in brick,<WH3843> and in all kinds of service<WH5656> in the field,<WH7704> all their service,<WH5656> in which they ruthlessly<WH6531> made them serve.<WH5647>

The king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> spoke<WH559> to the Hebrew<WH5680> midwives,<WH3205> of whom the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Shiphrah,<WH8236> and the name<WH8034> of the other<WH8145> Puah,<WH6326>

and he said,<WH559> "When you perform the duty of a midwife<WH3205> to the Hebrew women,<WH5680> and see<WH7200> them on the birth stool;<WH70> if it is a son,<WH1121> then you shall kill<WH4191> him;<WH1323> but if it is a daughter, then she shall live.<WH2425>"
But the midwives<WH3205> feared<WH3372> God,<WH430> and didn't<WH6213> do what the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> commanded<WH1696> them,<WH2421> but saved the baby boys<WH3206> alive.<WH2421>

The king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> called<WH7121> for the midwives,<WH3205> and said<WH559> to them,<WH4069> "Why have you done<WH6213> this thing,<WH1697> and have saved<WH2421> the boys<WH3206> alive?<WH2421>"

The midwives<WH3205> said<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> "Because the Hebrew<WH5680> women<WH802> aren't<WH4713> like the Egyptian women; for they are vigorous,<WH2422> and give birth<WH3205> before<WH2962> the midwife<WH3205> comes to them.<WH935>"
God<WH430> dealt well<WH3190> with the midwives,<WH3205> and the people<WH5971> multiplied,<WH7235> and grew very<WH3966> mighty.<WH6105>
It happened,<WH3205> because the midwives feared<WH3372> God,<WH430> that he gave<WH6213> them families.<WH1004>

Pharaoh<WH6547> commanded<WH6680> all his people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "You shall cast<WH7993> every son<WH1121> who is born<WH3209> into the river,<WH2975> and every daughter<WH1323> you shall save alive.<WH2421>"
